metadata.title: CVE-2017-0813 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android media framework(libstagefright). Product: Android. Versions: 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. AndroidID: A-36531046.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
